professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in installation, configuration, upgrades, patches, performance tuning, backup, recovery, cloning, database security, troubleshooting, database design, Unix Shell Scripting, and documentation. Proficient in Oracle Data Guard, Active Data Guard, ASM, RAC, ETL, SQL, PL/SQL, MySQL, AWS RDS, and various tools and software.

key_responsibilities: Maintain control files and redo log files.
Create databases for test and development.
Assist in database optimization and performance tuning.
Manage database backups and recovery processes.
Assist in database migration and integration.
Provided technical support for IT infrastructure.
Assisted with network and storage management.
Performed basic troubleshooting and system maintenance.
